summary.span: Represents a Windows icon, which is a small bitmap image that is used to represent an object.

span.span: Represents a Windows icon, which is a small bitmap image that is used to represent an object.

summary.span: Icons can be thought of as transparent bitmaps, although their size is determined by the system.

span.span: Icons can be thought of as transparent bitmaps, although their size is determined by the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建構從檔案、 資料流或內嵌的資源的物件。You can construct objects from files, streams, or embedded resources. 如需建構函式的清單，請參閱。For a list of constructors, see . 您也可以轉換使用點陣圖方法。You can also convert an to a bitmap by using the method. 圖示資源可以包含多個圖示的影像。An icon resource can contain multiple icon images. 一個圖示檔可能包含數個大小和色彩深度的影像。One icon file may contain images in several sizes and color depths. 應用程式中使用的映像，取決於作業系統和設定。The image that is used in an application depends on the operating system and settings. 下列清單詳細說明圖示的一般大小：The following list details the typical sizes for an icon: - 16 個像素 x 16 像素為單位16 pixels x 16 pixels - 32 像素 x 32 像素為單位32 pixels x 32 pixels - 48 像素 x 48 像素48 pixels x 48 pixels ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立表單，並貼上下列程式碼。Create a form and paste the following code into it. 呼叫`IconToBitmap`方法在表單的事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。Call the `IconToBitmap` method in the form's event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果找不版本與完全相符的大小，則會使用最接近的相符項目。If a version cannot be found that exactly matches the size, the closest match is used. 如果`original`參數是單一大小，這個方法只會建立重複的圖示。If the `original` parameter is an that has a single size, this method only creates a duplicate icon. 使用的延伸功能方法，以調整大小圖示。Use the stretching capabilities of the method to resize the icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立從具有指定之名稱的資源`resource`參數中包含所指定之類型的組件`type`參數。This constructor creates an from a resource with the name specified by the `resource` parameter in the assembly that contains the type specified by the `type` parameter. 這個建構函式結合指定型別的字串名稱與資源的命名空間，並尋找組件資訊清單中的比對。This constructor combines the namespace of the given type together with the string name of the resource and looks for a match in the assembly manifest. 比方說您可以傳入型別和`Error.ico`這個建構函式，並尋找資源，稱為`System.Windows.Forms.Error.ico`。For example you can pass in the type and `Error.ico` to this constructor, and it looks for a resource that is named `System.Windows.Forms.Error.ico`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 若要執行此範例中，將程式碼貼入 Windows 表單和處理表單的事件。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and handle the form's event. 呼叫`ConstructAnIconFromAType`方法，從事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。Call the `ConstructAnIconFromAType` method from the event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 相對路徑會假設為相對於目前工作目錄。A relative path is assumed to be relative to the current working directory. 當會使用與點陣圖的縮圖影像可能會傳回而不是圖示系統正在執行的應用程式是否會導致顯示為縮圖影像的點陣圖檔案的登錄設定。When is used with bitmaps, a thumbnail image may be returned instead of an icon if the system that is running the application has a registry setting that causes bitmap files to be shown as thumbnail images. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`ExtractAssociatedIconEx`從表單的建構函式或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `ExtractAssociatedIconEx` from the form's constructor or event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法時，您必須使用處置的原始圖示`DestroyIcon`Win32 API，以確保會釋放資源中的方法。When using this method, you must dispose of the original icon by using the `DestroyIcon` method in the Win32 API to ensure that the resources are released. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 將該物件繪製到螢幕。Draws that object to the screen. - 取得圖示控制代碼。Gets an icon handle for the . - 設定圖示控制代碼從建立表單的屬性。Sets the attribute of the form to an icon created from the handle. - 呼叫 Win32 API 函式`DestroyIcon`釋放資源。Calls the Win32 API function `DestroyIcon` to release resources. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Drawing.Bitmap ToBitmap() cil managed

summary.span: Converts this to a GDI+ .

span.span: Converts this to a GDI+ .
A that represents the converted .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透明區域的圖示都會遺失，則會轉換成點陣圖，並將產生的點陣圖的透明色彩設定為時`RGB(13,11,12)`。The transparent areas of the icon are lost when it is converted to a bitmap, and the transparent color of the resulting bitmap is set to `RGB(13,11,12)`. 傳回的點陣圖做為原始圖示中具有相同的高度和寬度。The returned bitmap has the same height and width as the original icon. > [!NOTE] > 從 framework 4.6 版支援已針對.ico 檔案中的 PNG 畫面格。Beginning with framework version 4.6 support was added for PNG frames in .ico files. 以舊版 framework 為目標但在 4.6 的位元上執行的應用程式可以選擇在新的行為藉由將下列這一行加入``app.config 檔的區段：``Applications that target earlier versions of the framework but are running on the 4.6 bits can opt in into the new behavior by adding the following line to the `` section of the app.config file:`` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立表單，並貼上下列程式碼。Create a form and paste the following code into it. 呼叫`IconToBitmap`在表單的方法。Call the `IconToBitmap` method in the form's . 事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。event handler, passing `e` as .
